user.title: Connect to Ampaera
user.description: Enter your API key from Settings > API in the Ampaera web app. Leave API URL empty to use production ({default_url}).

location.title: Configure Site
location.description: Set your site name and select your electricity grid region for accurate spot pricing.

devices.description: Choose which Home Assistant devices to sync with Ampaera. Found {device_count} compatible devices.

reauth_api_key.title: Enter New API Key

manage_devices.title: Manage Devices
manage_devices.description: Select which devices to sync with Ampaera. Found {device_count} available devices.

settings.title: Ampaera Settings
